name: Ball-Swinger
description:
Under Development:

This game is inspired by my favorite Fortnite  vehicle: the baller. A super-mobile ball which has three different ways to move:

  • Rolling
  • Jumping
  • Pulling itself towards and swinging between objects using a grappling hook.

Control this ball and swing yourself all over the map.

This game is currently in development. Currently, you can use a parkour to get to know the controls of the vehicle. Feel free to leave your feedback. Future updates will include a couple of mini-games using the ball-mechanics.
